content: the court in palermo has made a final ruling in a case involving the dissolution of a community property the property in question is a villa located in borgata the court has ordered the property to be divided equally among the coheirs with each party receiving onethird the coheirs are also required to pay the remaining balance of the propertys value to the other party one of the parties has been granted the release of the property the court has awarded costs of litigation to the prevailing party and has ordered one party to pay a sum of money to the other party the court considered legal principles related to property division and cost allocation in reaching its decision the court has dismissed all other claims and authorized the registrar of the real estate records to transcribe the judgment
